#include<stdio.h>
#define mod 1000000007
#define ll long long
ll int dp[501][501];
int main()
{
    int t,i,n,h,l,k,j;
    ll int ans,sum;
    for(i=1;i<=500;i++)
            dp[1][i]=1;
    for(i=2;i<=500;i++)
    {
        for(j=i;j<=500;j++)
        {
            dp[i][j]=dp[i][j-1]+dp[i-1][j-1];
            dp[i][j]%=mod;
        }
    }
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        sum=ans=0;
        scanf("%d%d%d",&n,&l,&h);
        for(i=l;i<=h;i++)
        {
            ans=(ans+dp[i][n])%mod;
        }
        printf("%lld\n",ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
